sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Box, Grid, HStack, Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionButton, AccordionIcon, AccordionPanel } from "@chakra-ui/react" /**************************************************** */ import { Textarea } from "../style_components/textarea" import { Text } from "../style_components/text" import { ManaSymbol } from "./mana_symbol" import { symbols } from "../ressources/symbols" /***************************************************************/ export function SpellDescription(props) { return ( Abilities :
